node.title: Escape from the Black Hole
node.description: Ivor Myers was a hip hop artist in the famous group known as the Boogie Monsters.  The group captivated so much fame and attention that they were eventually signed to EMI Records for a large record deal in 1995.  However, that same year, Ivor had a powerful experience with the Word of God which led him to walk away from serving the music industry to serving God.
